twcore.core
Class BotSettings

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.BotSettings

public class BotSettings
extends java.lang.Object

Reads, stores, and allows access to the settings in a bot's configuration file.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a BotSettings object with no data.
BotSettings(java.io.File file)
          Constructs a BotSettings object with the data from a properly formed configuration file.

          Constructs a BotSettings object with the data from a properly formed configuration file.
